years, and forms a part of many of their strike forces. With robust

drop-ship and deadly aerial combatant. A capacious troop bay and

Marines - and, thanks to its magna-grapples, even a Dreadnought -

Sicarius is a swordsman without equal, whipping his Tempest Blade
through the air in a shimmering blur of thrusts and parries. He is also
the undisputed master of the lightning assault, capable of appraising
the most complex tactical situation with little more than a glance and
deploying his warriors with absolute confidence.

of Ultramarines towards victory. Several centuries of battle have only
seen it blaze hotter than ever. On the battlefield he smites foes with
furious blows of his crozius arcanum, or gouts of flame and salvoes of
hellfire rounds from his combi-flamer, Infernus.

psychic fury. Blasts of energy leap from his staff, hurling foes through
the air and burning their souls to ash. It is the Chief Librarian’s acute
foresight that is most valuable to his Chapter - his merest intuition is
worth more than the predictions of an army of strategists and spies.

superlative warrior. He heralds his advance with thunderous volleys

anything in his grip. When he judges the endgame of his strategy to
be imminent, he leads his Ultramarines into the heart of enemy lines.

not fought against. With each encounter they collect tactical and
combat data to only further improve their lethality.

Ultramarines’ most capable commanders - if a maverick one. Having
served in the Deathwatch before becoming Captain, he has absorbed
the strategies of battle-brothers from a host of other Chapters, giving
him a breadth of tactical insight exceeding that of many of his peers.

Dorn, Lysander wades through his foes like a warship smashing
through stormy seas. Each hammer blow reduces enemies to bloody
ruin, sweeping whole ranks of warriors from their feet. All the while,
Lysander’s obstinate scowl never wavers, his determination absolute.

Gravis armour as he advances across the battlefield. Sharp-minded

lethal fire of his warriors through a combination of natural skill and the

destruction, striking hard and true in battle without tiring. Prodigiously
strong, he wields his mighty thunder hammer expertly, striking down
foes with every swing. Those enemies Agatone does not slay in this
way he purges with furious blasts from his hand-flamer, Drakkis.

Forgefather lays low all who oppose him. Seeker of the lost relics of

foe and face down any danger in order to see his oaths fulfilled.
